pageContext.claim: “CNN’s Don Lemon, the dumbest man on television, insinuated last night while asking a debate “question” that I was a racist, when in fact I am “the least racist person in the world.” Perhaps someone should explain to Don that he is supposed to be neutral, unbiased & fair.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may not believe he is a racist. But racist tropes have made their way into Trump’s language on multiple occasions. Most recently, the president tweeted that four Democratic minority Congresswomen — all Americans — should “go back” to where they came from. Washington Post Executive Editor Martin Baron noted in a statement, ”The ‘go back’ trope is deeply rooted in the history of racism in the United States. Therefore, we have concluded that ‘racist’ is the proper term to apply to the language [Trump] used [in his tweets].”
